phrases: Long ago, the four nations lived together in harmony.
Then, everything changed when the Fire Nation attacked.
Only the Avatar, master of all four elements, could stop them.
But when the world needed him most, he vanished.
A hundred years passed, and my brother and I discovered the new Avatar...
And although his airbending skills are great.
He has a lot to learn before he is ready to save anyone.
But I believe Aang can save the world.
A sword made out of a whale's tooth.
This is a water tribe weapon.
See if you can find anything else.
Water tribe warriors ambushed a group of firebenders.
The firebenders fought back, but the warriors drove them down this hill...
It is one of our boats!
No, but it is from his fleet.
See, Prince Zuko, a moment of quiet is good for your mental well being.
There are no stowaways on my ship.
The toxins'll wear off in about an hour.
But by then he will be in jail and I will have my money.
But how did you find him on my ship?
My shirshu can smell a rat a continent away.
You are not old enough to go to war, Sokka, you know that.
Being a man is knowing where you are needed the most,...
I am going to miss you so much.
It is so good to see you two!
Oh, you have grown so much.
No, he and the other warriors should be in the eastern Earth Kingdom by now.
This is no place for a reunion.
After I was wounded, your father carried me to this abbey.
The sisters have cared for me ever since.
They have been traveling with the Avatar.
I found them by my boat.
It is truly an honor to be here.
The sisters craft ointments and perfumes.
Maybe we could dump some on Appa?
Yeh, nothing's more comforting than dead animal skins.
Dad could eat a whole barrel of these things.
Bato, is it true you and Dad lassoed an arctic hippo?
Well, the hippo did the dragging.
One time there was this giant eel...
So who was it that came up with the great blubber fiasco?
It is a long one, Aang, some other time.
You and Dad had so many hilarious adventures.
Not all of which were hilarious at the time, but everything's funny with hindsight.
Aang, put that down, it is ceremonial and very fragile.
Was it you or Dad that put an octopus on your head...
Your dad wore the octopus, but I did the spooky voice.
I am sure you bathe regularly.
I need to talk to you.
Well, if it is not my new friends, Angry Boy and Uncle Lazy.
You have to pay me back.
Aww, I would love to help you out, but I am a little short on money.
Money is not what I had in mind.
I need you to find someone.
Your girlfriend run off on you?
It is not the girl I am after, it is the bald monk she is traveling with.
If you find them, I will consider the damage to my ship paid for.
Plus we will pay your weight in gold.
Make it your weight and we got a deal.
There is something I should tell you kids.
I am expecting a message from your father.
Your father said he would send a message...
If you wait here until the message arrives...
It is been over two years since we have seen Dad!
It would be great to see Dad.
It is been far too long, has not it?
I am not sure when word will arrive, but when it does...
It would be great, but we cannot.
We have to take Aang to the North Pole first.
Even if we had time to wait for the message, who knows how far we would have to travel.
We do not have time for a long detour.
I am sure your father would understand and be proud...
I cannot believe they would leave me.
I am looking for Bato of the Water Tribe.
It is the map to Sokka and Katara's Dad!
Sorry I was gone so long.
Hey Aang, I did not notice you left.
Yup, but now I am back.
Sure... could go for some delicious sea prunes!
Out for a bit of fresh air, are we?
I hope it is not Miyuki.
Miyuki, did you get in trouble with the Fire Nation again?
You should be ashamed of yourself... littering in the courtyard.
I will take care of this.
This ship is sentimental to me.
It was built by my father.
Is this the boat he took you ice-dodging in?
Yeh, it is got the scar to prove it.
You must have some good stories from your first time ice-dodging?
Dad left before he was old enough.
Oh, I forgot, you were too young.
It is a rite of passage for young water tribe members.
When you turn fourteen your Dad takes you...
Because the girl must of spent a lot of time here.
We have no time for this!
Care to hear your fortune, handsome?
At my age there is really only one big surprise left,...
Ice-dodging is a ceremonial test of wisdom, bravery and trust.
In our village it was done by weaving a boat through a field of icebergs.
How are we supposed to ice-dodge without ice?
Sokka, you steer and call the shots.
The winds can be brutal, so be brave.
Why would not I know that?
For this to be done right I cannot help.
You pass or fail on your own.
Aang, ease up on the jib.
Sokka, you have already proven yourself, maybe we should...
Aang, I am going to need air in that sail!
Katara, I want you to bend as much water as you can between us and those rocks!
The spirits of water bear witness to these marks.
For Sokka, the mark of the wise, the same mark your father earned.
For Katara, the mark of the brave.
And for Aang, the mark of the trusted.
You are now an honorary member of the water tribe.
Aang, what are you talking about.
A messenger gave this to me for Bato.
You have to understand, I was afraid you would...
This is the map to our father!
You had it the whole time!?
Well, you can go to the North Pole on your own!
I am going to find Dad.
Now Sokka, I think you should...
Guess I should be moving on.
No, it is been separated from the pack.
It is how I felt when the water tribe warriors had to leave me behind.
They were my family and being apart from them was more painful than my wounds.
I want to see Dad, but helping Aang is where we are needed the most.
And I know he is proud of you.
I know where to go from here.
Take this in case you want to find us.
I will leave a message at the rendezvous point.
Looks like we are going alone, guys.
A group of people came to the abbey looking for you.
A fierce looking woman with a horrible monster and a young man with a scar.
The beast was using the scent of a necklace to follow you.
She is way too pretty for you.
How stupid do you think I am?
What are we supposed to do now?
It is seeking a different scent... perhaps something that the Avatar held.
It is just going around in a circle!
I am starting to get some feeling back!
You have got something I want!
That thing sees with its nose.
Let us give him something to look at.
I did not see you get hit with the tongue.
We are getting you to the North Pole.
Yeh, we have lost too much time as it is.
Do not you want to see your father?
But, you are our family too, and right now, you need us more.
I wish I could give you a little piece of home, Katara.
Aang, how did you get that?
Zuko asked to be sure I got it to you.
Oh, that is so sweet of Zuko.
Would you give him a kiss for me when you see him?
